title: Social Network Usage Details
description: Social network usage information such as share, content, and network.

xdm:socialMarketing.description: Tracks interactions related to social marketing sites, such as shares and follows.

xdm:sharedContent.title: Shared Content
xdm:sharedContent.description: Tracks the page/url/content/value of the item being shared.

xdm:follow.title: Follow
xdm:follow.description: Tracks when a social follow event has occurred.

xdm:interactions.title: Interactions
xdm:interactions.description: The total number of social interactions.

xdm:network.title: Network
xdm:network.description: Tracks the social sharing network in use, i.e. Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, etc.

xdm:target.title: Target
xdm:target.description: For social interactions, this is the URL (or resource) which receives the social network action.

xdm:share.title: Share
xdm:share.description: Tracks when a social sharing event has occurred.
